Container.Name: Shrinkray
Container.Overview: A simple video transcoding tool for Unraid. Select a folder, pick a preset, and shrink your media library with hardware-accelerated HEVC/AV1 encoding.[br][br][b]GPU Setup (Recommended):[/b][br]For hardware-accelerated encoding, add the following to "Extra Parameters" in Advanced View:[br][br]Intel/AMD: --device=/dev/dri:/dev/dri[br]NVIDIA: --runtime=nvidia --gpus all (requires Nvidia-Driver plugin)[br][br]Without GPU passthrough, Shrinkray will fall back to slower CPU encoding.
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: transcode ffmpeg compression video hevc av1 shrink encode
Container.Requires: For hardware acceleration, GPU passthrough is required. See Overview for setup instructions.
